name: Stunt Biker From Hell - 3D Fast Motorcycle Driving Racer Game, with movie making, quick asphalt burning action and endless fun
name_original: Stunt Biker From Hell - 3D Fast Motorcycle Driving Racer Game, with movie making, quick asphalt burning action and endless fun
description:
Stunt Men are special people - they can fly, drive any vehicle, they are risking their lives to do interesting and spectacular stunts.

A very quick bike from Hell

Nowadays stuntmen are getting their power and motors from Hell. Their destination is unknown, but they are very quick, and they help to make very good action movies.
This time you are driving a special bike specially made for stunts, a real high-end motor. Your goal is not only to drive the bike, but to help the making of a new action movie. And your motorcycle is also a valuable asset on that.

So this time not only police chases will be happen, but you must drive as fast as you can to collect parts for finishing the movie. As time is of essence, the fastest stunt man will do the job, and this case the quickest is you with your motorcycle. Only your skill can help the movie, driving yor bike you must avoid bullets, traffic, contraflow, meanwhile you must collect movie relics. And of course you must practice your art of spectacular stunt driving with a motorcycle. Only perfection is acceptable between stuntmen!

Motor drive/driving

FEATURES

- Lifelike graphics covering arcade simulation aspects
- Real biking experience
- Never before experienced Stuntmen experience
- Endless gameplay
- Unique movie making environment for a biker
- Different challenges: bottlenecks, contraflow, moving machinery, traffic, motorcycles, etc...
- Intuitive control methods: direct control using your fingers. Alternate controls with relative touch.
- 3D Environment
- Highway environment with traffic, vehicles and obstacles for high speed driving
- No need of refueling, you can always concentrate on your goal
- Lots of powerups: Slow Motion, Coin Magnet, Shield, etc.
- Different skins for your vehicle for added gaming fun.

For more information please visit our website: www.pocketscientists.com
